snippet: In his return from major knee surgery, Minnesota Vikings running back Adrian Peterson earned most valuable player and offensive player of the year honors by The Associated Press.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Minnesota Vikings running back Adrian Peterson earns 2012 NFL Most Valuable Player and Offensive Player of the Year awards; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: In his return from major knee surgery, Minnesota Vikings running back Adrian Peterson earned most valuable player and offensive player of the year honors by The Associated Press.

headline.seo: Vikings’ Adrian Peterson Earns Most Valuable Player Award
headline.main: Peterson Ends Comeback Year as the M.V.P.
headline.print_headline: Peterson Ends Comeback Year As the M.V.P.
